document.full_text: deron williams may be out for the season, but in his short time with the nets he was able to preserve his streak of seasons in which he averaged 10 or more assists a game.
document.title: williams may be done, but assists streak continues
lines_and_colors: deron williams may be out for the season, but in his short time with the nets he was able to preserve his streak of seasons in which he averaged 10 or more assists a game.
